Article.ArticleTitle: No Impact of COVID-19 Pandemic on Early Mortality for Thyroid Cancer in the US. Comment on Lee et al. Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on Thyroid Cancer Surgery. Curr. Oncol. 2024, 31, 3579-3590.

Abstract.AbstractText: Thyroid cancer is relatively rare in the general population compared to other malignancies, but its incidence appears to have increased in recent decades [...].

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: We have read and understood Current Oncology’s policy on disclosing conflicts of interest, and we declare that we have none.
